name: AccountSignatures_GetAccountSignatures
description: Returns a list of stamps available in the account.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

stamp_format.description:
The format of the stamp to return. Valid values:
- `NameDateHanko`
- `NameHanko`
- `PlaceholderHanko`

stamp_name.description: The name associated with the stamps to return. This value can be a Japanese surname (up to 5 characters) or a purchase order ID.

stamp_type.description:
The type of the stamps to return. Valid values:
- `name_stamp`
- `stamp`
- `signature`

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
